document_data.name: Dowell Harpell
document_data.mainbody: '''Dowell Harpell''' was a member of the [[Harpell]] family and their spokesman in the late 15th century [[DR]]. He also served as [[Longsaddle]]'s representative on the council of the [[Lords' Alliance]].
document_data.Abilities: Dowell was an adept [[enchanter]], but was a notably unskilled [[evoker]].{{Cite digital book/Night of the Hunter/Kindle||10}}
document_data.Relationships:
Dowell took the Harpell name following his marriage to [[Penelope Harpell]]. 

He helped Penelope in teaching magic to the reborn [[Catti-brie]].
document_data.History:
Sometime prior to the 1480s DR, Dowell met and fell in love with Penelope during a battle with a [[hill giant]] king in which Dowell was nearly eaten alive, but was saved by his future wife. 

As of [[1489 DR]], he was recognized as the spokesman for all of Longsaddle at the Lords' Alliance's council.
